name: A Pirate's Luck
description:
" TREASURE AHOY,  LADS ! "

After spending half a lifetime to decode a very cryptic treasure map, a very desperate and ill-tempered pirate set out to find his mysterious treasure...

Together ,with his first mate and another scallywag, the captain raids the temple which is rumored to contain his treasure, only to find themselves lost in a Labyrinth of tunnels.

This is where the captain's luck is tested as he must choose to travel into a random tunnel without knowing if it treasure or trouble that awaits him on the other side....

This story has 7 different endings so try to find them all! (and remember to save sea turtles...they are adorable).

This fun little visual novel was made by George Jose (20BCG10019), Dyutin R. (20BCG10060) and Nandakishor V. (20BCG10057) as a part of our Game Programming project at VIT-Bhopal.

Used sailboat vector asset created by upklyak for the concept art.

https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/vector-sail-boats-with-white-red-black-sails...

Thanks for reading :)
